text: WASHINGTON President Joe Biden said on Friday that the Centers for Disease Control and Preventions guidance on school reopenings during the novel coronavirus pandemic is the best available scientific evidence on how to reopen schools safely.As many states continue to follow the CDCs recommendation to prioritize teachers for vaccination, I urge all states to follow suit, Biden said in a statement after the U.S. public health agency recommended universal mask-wearing and physical distancing to get children back in the classroom.
